text: (islam) dharmayehi bala kirimak næta. (mandayat) ayahamagehi sita (æt vi) rju margaya (at kara ganne keseda yanna) pæhædili vi giyeya. ebævin kavurun seyitanva pratiksepa kara dama, allahva visvasa karanneda, ohu niyata vasayenma kædi noyana saktimat kambayak alla gatteya. allah savan denneku ha hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
